module.p:
cìobair aig fang a shepherd at a fank –
Nuair a ràinig Màiri agus Seumas am monadh, bha na cìobairean aig an fhang.
When Mary and James reached the moor, the shepherds were at the fank. td. 76

fang ann am monadh a fank on a moor –
Nuair a ràinig Màiri agus Seumas am monadh, bha na cìobairean aig an fhang.
When Mary and James reached the moor, the shepherds were at the fank. td. 76

caora ann am fang a sheep in a fank –
Nuair a ràinig Màiri agus Seumas am monadh, bha na cìobairean aig an fhang agus stad Màiri mionaid no dhà a’ coimhead air na caoraich agus air na h-uain.
When Mary and James reached the moor, the shepherds were at the fank and Mary stopped for a minute or two looking at the sheep and at the lambs. td. 76

uan ann am fang a lamb in a fank –
Nuair a ràinig Màiri agus Seumas am monadh, bha na cìobairean aig an fhang agus stad Màiri mionaid no dhà a’ coimhead air na caoraich agus air na h-uain.
When Mary and James reached the moor, the shepherds were at the fank and Mary stopped for a minute or two looking at the sheep and at the lambs. td. 76
